script:
1). Does Mr. Roth prefer coffee or tea?
Coffee, I think. 
Yes, he does.
He doesn't like Coke.
2). Who's Jean Carrier's supervisor?
No, we don't carry jeans.
It's Paul Henrickson. 
She supervises R&D.
3). What an incredible game last night!
The movie was great!
Yeah, it sure was! 
Yes, it was horrible!
